channel.title: carhacking on DH.J
channel.description: Recent content in carhacking on DH.J

item.title: GM Equinox Automotive Infotainment Vulnerability
item.description: Information Vehicle model : GM Chevrolet Equinox 2021 Software version : 2021.03.26 build ver. Summary We analyzed the vulnerabilities in the infotainment system of General Motors (GM) Chevrolet Equinox 2021 vehicle and found a USB memory vulnerability that caused the infotainment to crash. Analysis TBD (No plans to go public yet.) Impact This attack could allow an attacker to abnormally shut down the vehicle’s infotainment system (resulting in an internal crash).

item.title: Renault ZOE Automotive Infotainment Vulnerability
item.description: Information Vehicle model : Renault ZOE EV 2021 Software version : 283C35202R Summary We analyzed the vulnerabilities in the infotainment system of Renault’s ZOE EV vehicle and found a USB memory vulnerability that caused the infotainment to crash. [Figure 1]] Vendor Reply E-mail Analysis TBD (No plans to go public yet.) Impact This attack could allow an attacker to abnormally shut down the vehicle’s infotainment system (resulting in an internal crash).

item.title: Volkswagen Jetta Automotive Infotainment Vulnerability
item.description: Information Vehicle model : Volkswagen Jetta 2021 Hardware version : 724 Software version : 0876 Summary We analyzed the vulnerabilities in the infotainment system of Volkswagen Jetta vehicle and found a USB memory vulnerability that caused the infotainment to crash. Analysis TBD (No plans to go public yet.) Impact This attack could allow an attacker to abnormally shut down the vehicle’s infotainment system (resulting in an internal crash).
